item.description:
Sweatshirts with your favorite meetup group logo are now available !!

 

The sizes and colors available are as follows:

Small-5XL

Black, Navy, Forest Green, Irish Green, Maroon, Dk.Gray, Light Blue, Light Pink, and Sand

 

The cost per sweatshirt is $15.00.  Any shirt over XL will be $2.00 more.

 

After the funds have been collected and orders placed,  we will set up another meetup date for people to collect their shirts in conjunction with a dog walk or event.

 

If you want more than one sweatshirt, select it in the number of guests when you rsvp.   In the rsvp questions,  list the size and color of each shirt you want.  Please send a check to:  The Granite Moose, 304 Titus Ave, Manchester, NH  03103.  If you need to pay by credit card, there will be a $1.50 processing charge added.  Please contact Mary to pay by credit card.

If you have questions,  please contact Mary at

blacklab08022@comcast.net

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Doggie Paws Sweatshirts
